name: IwannaDie
description:
You're the result of a laboratory experience, and you can't die from normal things such as fire/drowning etc.  You're trying to find the way to reach the stone of death that will allow you once for all to go to Heaven. 

(As Mitty in "Made in abyss" 🔺if you google it, it's a bit gore🔺)

You're trying in this game to reach the exit of each room until the stone. It's a game about solving puzzles using your ability to pass through walls for a little time when you die.

We are sorry, we lacked of time and the game is still under development, hope you will have fun anyway. 

A team of 3 French students from the school of ESIR
